name: The Orphaned Soul
description: A young girl, abandoned as an infant, goes on a search for her parents and identity in a dark fantasy world populated with foul beasts and nasty cuthroats.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Pentium Core i3+ or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Graphic Card or higher Storage: 450 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended for music and sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Pentium Core i5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM
